# Haxe Roundup № 65

Via twitter

Escape from Hanoi, created during a HTML5 hackathon, made with Flambe which allows you to rapidly cook up Flash and HTML5 games

  • via Bruno Garcia

    • You can now see a list of devices that run NME and also report any devices not listed on the forum

  • via NME

    • A new open source project from Massive Interactive, Massive Cover, a cross platform code coverage framework for haxe 2.08 can be found at github

  • via misprintt

    • Two new games have been added to the NME showcase page, Ponon! Deluxe and Bouncy Seed

  • via NME
